description: On Thursday, Coco Austin, 36, gave the world another up-close look at her precious princess, daughter Chanel Marrow, two months. The Instagram snap featured the little one in a sparkling headband.
title: Coco Austin shares photo of daughter Chanel
title_page: Coco Austin shares photo of daughter Chanel | Daily Mail Online
text:
Coco Austin, 36, gave the world another close-up look at her daughter Chanel Marrow on Thursday.
The blonde model shared a photo of the two-month-old baby on Instagram which she captioned: 'My lovebug.'
The day before the newborn met father Ice-T's co-star Mariska Hargitay, 52, during her visit to the set of Law & Order: SVU in New York.
Scroll down for video
Proud mother: On Thursday, Coco Austin, 36, gave the world another up-close look at her daughter Chanel Marrow, two months
Meet-and-greet: Just yesterday, the little one had her very own one-on-one time with Mariska Hargitay, 52
Coco also wrote: 'This is the new sneaky look she gives.'
The snap featured the dimpled-darling clad in a rose-print onesie appearing to show off her famous father's features that she now possesses herself.
The blue-eyed beauty was quite the accessorized beauty, wearing a beautiful gold and pink Love headband from accessory collection, Winter Scarlett.
Playing with baby: Another shot featuring the duo appeared on Chanel's own Instagram account, with over 247,000 followers
Warm and comfy: The adorable two-month-old kept warm in a fuzzy onesie
Silly faces: In a post from Saturday, Coco shared a collage photo of her daughter showing love to the camera
Happy baby: On Monday, the blue-eyed beauty gave a big smile as she lay comfortable in a blue butterfly onsie
The child was wearing the same outfit for her one-on-one time with Hargitay.
The TV veteran was undoubtedly ecstatic to meet two-month old, according to a picture she shared on Instagram.
'This baby #CouldNotBeAnyCuter. #IceIceBaby #CocosChanel #LetsGetThisBabyOnScreen #AStarIsBorn #DaddysEyes #LoveHeadbandOnFleek @icet @coco,' read the photo's caption.
Cutest companion: New mom Coco Austin, 36, toted her little one in a car seat as she went shopping for her
Another shot featuring the duo appeared on Chanel's own Instagram account, with over 247,000 followers.
In the snap, Mariska is seen cradling Chanel, as she smiles while playing with her tiny mouth and chin.
'Ohhh now this is a pretty lady..I like her.. my parents say her name is @therealmariskahargitay? ..nice,' read the caption.
Patiently waiting: Two weeks ago, Coco shared this shot of Chanel laying comfortably in a bathroom sink while she did her make-up
